oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Star Kist: CBC Christmas Concert '72
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Programs; Theater programs; Performances; De La Salle Christian Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the 1960s and 70s, Christian Brothers College was also home to first year Brothers Scholastics. Brothers-in-training were housed in the Scholasticate building (now Lambert Hall) for their general education prior to moving on to higher-level theological studies elsewhere. Among their activities the student Brothers staged performances such as this Christmas concert.
